citations.narrative:
* There was no record date for heartworm and fecal float testing for 41 dogs. Annual heartworm and fecal float testing
are important for the health of the animals. Heartworm and fecal float testing are done to ensure that there are no active
internal parasites. Heartworms are serious parasites that are transmitted by insect bites. Each dealer must follow an
appropriate program of veterinary care for dogs that is developed, documented in writing, and signed by the attending
veterinarian. The licensee must ensure that all dogs are receiving vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases of
dogs (including rabies, parvovirus, and distemper) and sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including
fleas, worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian.
Correct by 6/24/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
*   There was no record date for heartworm and fecal float testing for 41 dogs.  Annual  heartworm and fecal float testing 
are important for the health of the animals.  Heartworm and fecal float testing are done to ensure that there are no active 
internal parasites.   Heartworms are serious parasites that are transmitted by insect bites.  Each dealer must follow an 
appropriate program of veterinary care for dogs that is developed, documented in writing, and signed by the attending 
veterinarian. The licensee must ensure that all dogs are receiving vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases of 
dogs (including rabies, parvovirus, and distemper) and sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including 
fleas, worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian.  
Correct by 6/24/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
